approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard to allow V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes, replacing the current manual request process.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce manual effort in retrieving recordings.
Provide recordings searchable by LAN ID, date, and month.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently requests video recordings from the IT data server team, which is a manual process. This project aims to automate and streamline this process by providing a portal for authorized users to access the recordings.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All V-KYC recordings should be available on the portal.
Recordings should be fetched as and when required.
Recordings should be searchable by date and month.
Recordings should be visible if searched by LAN ID.
Users should be able to upload an Excel or text file with up to 50 LAN IDs.
The system should trigger a backend API call to process the request upon file upload.
Results should be displayed in a tabular format with a "Download All" option.
The table should have pagination displaying 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records should be downloaded at a time.
File upload should accept CSV/TXT files.
The recording download should start upon clicking the LAN ID.
Access to the screen should be limited to Team Leaders.

functional_requirements: Search functionality by LAN ID, date, and month.
Bulk download functionality (up to 50 LAN IDs).
Display of recording details (User ID, Call Duration, Status, Time, Date, NFS VKYC Upload Time).
non_functional_requirements: Access control: Limited to Team Leaders.
Performance: System should handle bulk downloads efficiently.
Security: Secure storage and access to recordings.
success_criteria: Easy access to V-KYC recordings for authorized users.
Reduction in time taken to retrieve recordings.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
File upload limit of 50 LAN IDs.
Download limit of 10 records at a time.
assumptions: The NFS server is accessible and recordings are stored in a consistent format.
The backend API for processing requests is available.
risks: Integration issues with the NFS server.

recommendations: Add details about the security measures to be implemented.
Specify the expected response time for the API calls.

identified_gaps: Performance testing requirements are not specified.
recommendations_for_completion: Define security protocols for data access and storage.
Include performance testing criteria in the requirements.
